text: @realDonaldTrump QUESTION TO THE PRESIDENT: DO YOU AGREE THAT THE MOST SERIOUS PRE-EXISTING CONDITION FOR CORONAVIRUS VICTIMS IS THEIR BLACK SKIN COLOUR? IF NOT WHY ARE BLACKS DISPROPORTIONATELY DYING? IS THERE INSTITUTIONAL COMPLACENCE? SHOULD THERE BE AN URGENT INQUIRY? IT IS SCANDALOUS NOT SO?
